item.title: I keep getting not a statement error
item.dc:creator: @darkageisme darkageisme
item.description:
@darkageisme wrote:

[quote=“JaydenD12, post:11, topic:452503”][quote author=darkageisme link=topic=555382.msg4066094#msg4066094 date=1343903064]

dude i have this error my some of my sources run fine


[/quote]

I’m struggling to comprehend what you’re trying to accomplish, I’m also struggling to determine if this is some sort of stupid joke, or you are in fact incredibly stupid. In all my years of being a programmer, I’ve never seen anybody (even a beginner) write such poor code.

I highly suggest you read up on the Java language, here’s a good place to start:

http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/[/quote]
I showed you the error your a idiot.

item.description:
@darkageisme wrote:

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:1207: error: not a statement
Public Void; donatorCommands;Client c, String;playerCommand;
^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:1207: error: not a statement
Public Void; donatorCommands;Client c, String;playerCommand;
^
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

And this is the line it says its not a statement on:Public Void; donatorCommands;Client c, String;playerCommand;
